Name: Medusa
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Spear of the Gorgons and Hair of Serpents

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.

At the start of each Step this model may select an enemy Formation within 12” and roll a D6. On a 4+ (or a 6+ if the selected Formation has the LEGENDARY tag) the selected Formation may not Move, Dash, Disengage, Cast Spells, Deny Spells, Fire Raged weapons, Charge, Counter Charge or be selected to fight until the end of the Step.

Spells.Name: Gaze of Terror (25)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 18” of the caster. Until the end of the round models in that Formation must subtract 1 from their hit and wound rolls.
